field.name: ssn
field.comment: Social Security Number

field.name: school_name
field.comment: Last Attended School Name

field.name: school_city
field.comment: Last Attended School City

field.name: school_state
field.comment: Last Attended School State

field.name: school_phone
field.comment: Last Attended School Phone Number

field.name: school_fax
field.comment: Last Attended School Fax Number

field.name: prev_icsd
field.comment: Has this student previously attended any school in Iron County School District?

field.name: prev_utah
field.comment: Has this student previously attended any school in the State of Utah?

field.name: outside_us
field.comment: Was this student born outside the US?

field.name: count_terr_birth
field.comment: Country/Territory of Birth

field.name: date_first_enrolled
field.comment: Date this student was first enrolled in a US school

field.name: three_ac_yrs
field.comment: Has this student attended one or more schools inside the US or US Territory for fewer than three full academic years?

field.name: completed_grades
field.comment: grade levels and years completed

field.name: prim_lang
field.comment: Primary Language

field.name: cur_lang
field.comment: Current Language

field.name: home_lang
field.comment: Language spoken at home

field.name: corres_lang
field.comment: Language of correspondence (ENG or SPA)

field.name: bilingual
field.comment: Has your child ever been in a bilingual educational or an English as a Second Language (ESL) program?

field.name: full_time
field.comment: Will this student attend school Full-Time?

field.name: part_time_reason
field.comment: Reason for student to attend school Part-Time

field.name: hisp_latino
field.comment: Is this student Hispanic/Latino?

field.name: race
field.comment: What is your student's race?

field.name: past_special_ed_services
field.comment: Has this student ever received special education services?

field.name: current_special_ed_services
field.comment: Is this student currently receiving sped services?

field.name: speech_lang_services
field.comment: Has student ever received speech and/or language services?

field.name: services_504
field.comment: Has student ever received 504 services?

field.name: foster_ward_student
field.comment: Is student a Foster Child or Ward of the State?

field.name: juvenile_probation
field.comment: Is student in Juvenile Probation?

field.name: other_info
field.comment: Other information necessary for appropriate educational placement

field.name: safe_school_violation
field.comment: Has student been previously suspended or expelled from school for a safe school violation?

field.name: safe_school_violation_expl
field.comment: Other information necessary for appropriate educational placement

field.name: staging_enroll_status
field.comment: Has the student been enrolled on the admin side yet? null/0=Have NOT been registered, -99=HAS been registered

field.name: enrollment_year
field.comment: School year that the student is registering for
